text:
Radient | Groningen, Netherlands | ONSITE | Product Owner | https://radient.io

Radient is an early stage technology startup from The Netherlands, founded June 2018. We create new and innovative ways for people to enjoy their content by focusing on audio.

We are looking for a product owner to help us strengthen and evolve our product vision and strategy.

Check out our job description on github and apply. https://github.com/radient/open-positions/blob/master/jobs/p...
